me hethuwen pana nagina parisarika gatalu sambandhayen awashya upades saha prathipaththi sampadanaya sandaha madhyama parisara adhikariye mulikathwayen, saththwa palana saha gramiya sanwardhana amathyanshaya, saukhya amathyanshaya saha palath palana amathyanshaya saha palath sabha yana rajya aayathana wala sahabhagithwayen upadeshana kamituwak pihituwa atha. 2010 nowambar 30 wana da saha shri lankawe saththwa gowipala karmanathyan hi parisara hithakami nambauruwa pilibanda danumwath kirime wadasatahanak madhyama parisara adhikariye shrawanagarayehi pawathwini.
